mat.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a small piece of thick rough material which covers part of a floor
mat.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Wipe your feet on the mat.
mat.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a small flat piece of wood, cloth etc which protects a surface, especially on a table
mat.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: a beer mat  (=a mat for putting a glass of beer on)
a mouse mat  (=for a computer mouse)
mat.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a piece of thick soft material used in some activities for people to sit on, fall onto etc
mat.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: a thick mass of something such as hairs or leaves
